mapper.insert: insert into member(mid, mpassword, mname, memail, mphone, mzipcode, maddress1, maddress2, mbirth, mgender, mlogintype, mtosno, menabled, mrole, mgrade, mmileage) values(#{mid},#{mpassword},#{mname},#{memail},#{mphone},#{mzipcode}, #{maddress1}, #{maddress2}, #{mbirth}, #{mgender}, 'normal', 1, 1, 'user', 1, 1000)
mapper.select: select mid, mpassword, mname, memail, mphone, mtel, mzipcode, maddress1, maddress2, mbirth, mgender, mrefid, mlogintype, mtosno, menabled, mrole, mgrade, mmileage from member where mid = #{mid}
select mpassword from member where mid = #{mid}
select mid from member where mname = #{mname} and mbirth = #{mbirth}
